segments.text: Could you help me prepare for my presentation on Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would love to help you prepare for your presentation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate to ask you to do something like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This will not interfere with my work . I promise you that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could easily give you some time tomorrow night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to meet me at the coffee house next door ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and could you write down anything you might be having trouble with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Goodbye until then . I promise you that you'll do well after we meet .
segments.speaker: S2
